skill.name: UI Design System
skill.description: The Design System, Theme, and UX rules for the Physical AI Hub.
skill.summary: The Design System, Theme, and UX rules for the Physical AI Hub.
skill.author: AbdulSamad94

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation file containing design system guidelines. No executable code, no network calls, no file system modifications, no environment access.

content.value_statement: Teams need clear design rules to build cohesive interfaces. This skill provides a complete design system with typography, colors, components, and animations for modern dark-themed applications.
actual_capabilities: Define typography rules using Poppins font with specified weights
Apply dark mode color palette with teal accent colors
Create glassmorphism card effects with blur and transparency
Implement smooth hover transitions and animations
Style rounded buttons, inputs, and dropdowns with consistent design
limitations: Does not generate code or implement components
Does not validate existing code against design rules
Does not integrate with design tools like Figma or Sketch
Provides guidelines only, no automated enforcement

use_cases.title: Build consistent UI components
use_cases.description: Apply design system rules when coding buttons, cards, inputs, and other UI elements for dark-themed applications.

use_cases.title: Define design standards
use_cases.description: Establish consistent typography, colors, and component styles across a design system for a product team.

use_cases.title: Maintain brand coherence
use_cases.description: Ensure all interface elements follow the same visual language with defined gradients, shadows, and animations.

prompt_templates.title: Get typography rules
prompt_templates.prompt: What are the typography rules for this design system? Include font family, weights, and usage guidelines.

prompt_templates.title: Apply color palette
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the dark mode color palette to style a new section. Include background gradient, accent colors, and text colors.

prompt_templates.title: Create glassmorphism card
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a glassmorphism card component. Include blur effect, transparency, rounded corners, and shadow depth.

prompt_templates.title: Implement smooth animations
prompt_templates.prompt: Add smooth hover transitions and keyframe animations to a dropdown menu. Use cubic-bezier easing for premium feel.

output_examples.input: Create a button following the design system
output: Button style: Rounded corners with smooth hover transitions
Transition: all 0.2s ease with subtle shadows

best_practices: Use Poppins font with 400, 500, 600, and 700 weights for consistent typography across all text elements.
Apply the dark gradient background and teal accent colors to maintain visual consistency throughout the application.
Implement glassmorphism effects with blur, transparency, and rounded corners for cards and floating elements.
anti_patterns: Mixing serif fonts with the Poppins geometric sans-serif breaks visual hierarchy and brand consistency.
Using bright or saturated accent colors instead of the specified teal #2d7d6c creates visual dissonance.
Applying sharp corners to buttons and cards instead of 12px to 16px rounded corners undermines the modern aesthetic.

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for design guidance.

faq.question: What font does this design system use?
faq.answer: Poppins geometric sans-serif font with 400, 500, 600, and 700 weights.

faq.question: Can I use this for light mode interfaces?
faq.answer: This design system is optimized for dark mode with teal accents. Light mode is not covered.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only reads documentation. No code execution or network access occurs.

faq.question: How do I integrate with Tailwind CSS?
faq.answer: The design system specifies global variables in app/globals.css and Tailwind configuration.

faq.question: How is this different from other design systems?
faq.answer: This system focuses on Physical AI aesthetic with glassmorphism, dark gradients, and teal accents.
